scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run deploy && sleep 30 && npm run demo && npm run destroy && npm run clean
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd src && tsc app.ts && cd .. && cp src/app.js dist/app.js
scripts.deploy: cd cdk && npx cdk@1.86 deploy --outputs-file ../client/stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.destroy: cd cdk && npx cdk@1.86 destroy && cd ..
scripts.init: cd src && npm install && cd ../cdk && npm install && cd ..
